measure.name: set_fcu_inputs
measure.description: Sets inputs for one or more Fan Coil Units and associated Clg Coils and Htg Coils. Objects can be filtered by name using the search string.
measure.modeler_description: Loops through ZoneHVACFourPipeFanCoil objects, CoilCoolingWater, and CoilHeatingWater objects and sets fields based on user arguments.

argument.name: string
argument.display_name: Set inputs for equipment containing the string:

argument.name: fcu_sched
argument.display_name: Availability Schedule Name

argument.name: fcu_sa_flow
argument.display_name: FCU: Maximum Supply Air Flow Rate {ft3/min}

argument.name: fcu_sa_rat_low
argument.display_name: FCU: Low Speed Supply Air Flow Ratio

argument.name: fcu_sa_rat_med
argument.display_name: FCU: Medium Speed Supply Air Flow Ratio

argument.name: fcu_oa_flow
argument.display_name: FCU: Maximum Outdoor Air Flow Rate {ft3/min}

argument.name: fcu_oa_sched
argument.display_name: Outdoor Air Schedule Name

argument.name: fcu_cw_flow_max
argument.display_name: FCU: Maximum Cold Water Flow Rate {gal/min}

argument.name: fcu_cw_flow_min
argument.display_name: FCU: Minimum Cold Water Flow Rate {gal/min}

argument.name: fcu_clg_tol
argument.display_name: FCU: Cooling Convergence Tolerance

argument.name: fcu_max_hw_flow
argument.display_name: FCU: Maximum Hot Water Flow Rate {gal/min}

argument.name: fcu_min_hw_flow
argument.display_name: FCU: Minimum Hot Water Flow Rate {gal/min}

argument.name: fcu_htg_tol
argument.display_name: FCU: Heating Convergence Tolerance

argument.name: cc_sched
argument.display_name: Clg Coil: Availability Schedule Name

argument.name: cc_wtr_flow
argument.display_name: Clg Coil: Design Water Flow Rate {gal/min}

argument.name: cc_air_flow
argument.display_name: Clg Coil: Design Air Flow Rate {GPM}

argument.name: cc_ewt
argument.display_name: Clg Coil: Design Inlet Water Temperature {F}

argument.name: cc_eat
argument.display_name: Clg Coil: Design Inlet Air Temperature {F}

argument.name: cc_lat
argument.display_name: Clg Coil: Design Outlet Air Temperature {F}

argument.name: cc_humrat_in
argument.display_name: Clg Coil: Design Inlet Air Humidity Ratio

argument.name: cc_humrat_out
argument.display_name: Clg Coil: Design Outlet Air Humidity Ratio

argument.name: cc_analysis
argument.display_name: Clg Coil: Type of Analysis

argument.name: cc_config
argument.display_name: Clg Coil: Heat Exchanger Configuration

argument.name: hc_sched
argument.display_name: Htg Coil: Availability Schedule Name

argument.name: hc_ua
argument.display_name: Htg Coil: U-Factor Times Area Value {Btu/h-R}

argument.name: hc_wtr_flow_max
argument.display_name: Htg Coil: Maximum Water Flow Rate {ft3/min}

argument.name: hc_perf
argument.display_name: Htg Coil: Performance Input Method

argument.name: hc_cap
argument.display_name: Htg Coil: Rated Capacity {Btu/h}

argument.name: hc_ewt
argument.display_name: Htg Coil: Rated Inlet Water Temperature {F}

argument.name: hc_eat
argument.display_name: Htg Coil: Rated Inlet Air Temperature {F}

argument.name: hc_lwt
argument.display_name: Htg Coil: Rated Outlet Water Temperature {F}

argument.name: hc_lat
argument.display_name: Htg Coil: Rated Outlet Air Temperature {F}

argument.name: hc_conv_ratio
argument.display_name: Htg Coil: Rated Ratio for Air and Water Convection
